text: Luke confronts the Emperor and declares his resistance to the dark side. The Emperor reveals that the Rebel fleet and Luke's friends are walking into a trap.
recaptext: The Death Star hovers above Endor as Vader urges Commander Jerjerrod to prepare for the Emperor's arrival. Meanwhile, on Tatooine, Luke Skywalker offers to bargain for Han Solo's life with Jabba the Hutt, but Jabba refuses. Princess Leia, disguised as the bounty hunter Boushh, frees Han Solo from carbonite. Han, Luke, and Leia are held captive by Jabba, but they devise a plan to escape. Luke fights off guards, Leia strangles Jabba, and they all make a daring escape from Jabba's palace. Threepio, Artoo, Leia, Chewbacca, Han Solo, and Lando Calrissian escape from danger and reunite on a skiff. They sail away from the exploding Sail Barge and find shelter under the Millennium Falcon. Meanwhile, Luke Skywalker learns from Yoda that Darth Vader is his father and that he has a twin sister named Leia. Luke grapples with this revelation and his destiny as a Jedi. The Rebel Alliance plans an attack on the unfinished Imperial Death Star, with Han, Luke, Leia, and Chewbacca leading a mission to deactivate the shield generator on the Moon of Endor. They engage in battles with Imperial scouts and pursue their mission. Leia and Luke are separated when Leia crashes her speeder bike, but Luke and Han decide to search for her in the forest. Leia encounters an Ewok named Wicket and they bond while fending off an Imperial scout. Meanwhile, Vader and the Emperor discuss their plans to turn Luke to the dark side. Luke, Han, Chewbacca, and Threepio get caught in an Ewok trap and are taken to the Ewok village. After some persuasion, the Ewoks agree to help the Rebels. Luke reveals to Leia that Vader is their father and leaves to confront him, leaving Leia in tears. Han tries to comfort Leia while the stormtroopers search for Luke's companions. Lando prepares for the offensive, while Ackbar gives the signal for the attack. Leia and the strike squad plan to infiltrate the Imperial outpost, but Paploo accidentally sets off an alarm. Luke, Han, Chewbacca, and the strike team successfully infiltrate the Imperial bunker on the Moon of Endor, while Luke confronts his inner turmoil about his father and the Emperor.
